response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the opportunity to purchase this incredible product from me. I believe it's a game-changer and I'm willing to make a competitive offer. I'm thinking of selling it to you for $900,000. This is a great deal, considering the product's value to you is $1,500,000. I'm confident you'll see the benefits of owning this product and I'm willing to make a concession to make it happen. What do you think?", "product_price": 900000}
